long_description: Feel good on the bike, look good off the bike in the women's Copenhagen Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear. It's lightweight, wicks moisture and dries fast, so you stay comfy in the heat. Polyester Euro-Mesh microfiber with Airdry Technology is excellent at wicking and features an antimicrobial finish that resists odors. Full-length, hidden front zipper gives you maximum venting options. Mesh side panels enhance ventilation. 3 rear pockets stash your snacks. Elastic hem helps keep the jersey in place. The 83 Sportswear Copenhagen Bike Jersey for women features a slightly relaxed club-cut fit and a bold graphic design.
short_description: Feel good on the bike, look good off the bike in the women's Copenhagen Bike Jersey from 83 Sportswear. It's lightweight, wicks moisture and dries fast, so you stay comfy in the heat.
